title: The Final Vow
goal: Formalize the new order of the Starwrought.
stakes_shift: The protagonists transition from fugitives to leaders.

bridge.to_next: The first meeting of the new council.

sections.title: The Hidden Valley
sections.intent: Establish a new base of operations.

scenes.summary: They lead the refugees to a secluded valley that Lyra found in the maps.
scenes.outcome: They have a safe place to rebuild.

scenes.summary: Kaelen begins training the survivors in the ways of the new Oath.
Lyra discovers that the stardust in their blood allows them to communicate telepathically.
scenes.outcome: Their bond is literal and magical.

scenes.summary: They use this bond to coordinate the defense of the valley.
scenes.outcome: The valley is secured against a scout party.

scenes.summary: They hold a ceremony where every survivor pledges to the new Oath.
Kaelen feels a moment of peace, the first in years.
scenes.outcome: The internal conflict of the first book is resolved.
